title: Flappy Rayman
subtitle: JavaScript and CSS3 game
coAuthors: Guðjón Geir Jónsson, Árni Freyr Þorsteinsson
tags: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Web Development, Game Development
description: This is a small remake of the famous Flappy Bird with Rayman, a video game character from the Rayman series as the hero. The game is written in HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript and is a result of a project in Reykjavik University.
